info.title: Bayani
info.description: Ka koyi yadda  Pecky yake aiki,  Pecky token ne na al'umma a Supra ba tare da team tokens ba. Ka fahimci yadda muke ∆ôona Pecky ta hanyar ajiya, NFT royalties, da PeckyBot.

info.introText:
Pecky ya fito ne daga tarin ChickenWings NFT.
Pecky token ne na gaskiya mallakin al'umma 100% ba tare da team tokens ba. Ri∆ôe Peckys …óinka da ∆ôarfi, domin muna ∆ôona duk abin da muka samu!

staking.title: AJIYA
staking.description:
Yi ajiya da $SUPRA a Meridian node ka samu ladan 8% kamar ko'ina,
amma kuma za ka samu adadin $Pecky iri …óaya da SUPRA …óinka kowace rana!

Maimakon mu ri∆ôe su, muna amfani da kowane ku…ói don sayan pecky da kuma ∆ôona Pecky din!

‚Ä¢ wani yayi tayin NFT …óinka
‚Ä¢ an saka NFT daga manyan tarin ∆ôasa da farashin da ka saita
